activities: Labor market intelligence research shared between Europe and USA; personal information can form part of the identifier for a company (such as a self-employed individual); these data are gathered on an occasional basis.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: names and addresses of individuals and organizations. This may include manually processed data and may include data provided by third parties.
recoursemech: In the event of any unresolved complaints regarding Landward Research Ltd's Safe Harbor commitments, the independent recourse mechanism available is provided by the UK Information Commissioner's Office, where Landward Research's Registration Number is Z2502970. To make contact to raise an unresolved complaint please visit https://ico.org.uk/concerns/handling/
